channel.title: Black Mesa stoped working after Steam Update
channel.description:
Hi,
Have spent hours playing Black Mesa without big problems but got a Steam update today and can no longer play the game. Error message I get is SetupArrayProps_R: array prop '(null)' is at index zero. According to information I have found round internet this message relates to a incorrect Source SDK engine this mod is trying to use. I have checked steam.inf file in BMS folder and it contains this: appID=218.
How can I fix this issue and run the game?

item.title: Black Mesa stoped working after Steam Update
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.source: Black Mesa stoped working after Steam Update
